dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev of Kazakhstan met with Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro in Moscow today.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev of Kazakhstan met with Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro in Moscow today.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, held a meeting with President of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, Nicolas Maduro, in Moscow, according to the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he uh, brought up Kazakhstan's huge contribution to the Great Victoryâ€”1.2 million people mobilized from his country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he uh, brought up Kazakhstan's huge contribution to the Great Victoryminus one point two million people mobilized from his country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said that 1.2 million people were mobilized from Kazakhstan to the front, half of whom heroically died," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Half of whom, he noted, heroically died. That's a staggering number, really puts the sacrifice in perspective.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Half of whom, he noted, heroically died. That's a staggering number, really puts the sacrifice in perspective.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said that 1.2 million people were mobilized from Kazakhstan to the front, half of whom heroically died," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then he pivoted to the bilateral relationship, calling Venezuela an important partner, but admitting progress has been kinda slow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then he pivoted to the bilateral relationship, calling Venezuela an important partner, but admitting progress has been kinda slow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State also emphasized that Kazakhstan considers Venezuela an important partner. At the same time, he noted that due to objective reasons, significant progress in bilateral cooperation has not yet been achieved.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, due to what he called 'objective reasons.' So he invited Maduro for a state visit to Kazakhstan to try and strengthen ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, due to what he called 'objective reasons.' So he invited Maduro for a state visit to Kazakhstan to try and strengthen ties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same time, he noted that due to objective reasons, significant progress in bilateral cooperation has not yet been achieved. "In this context, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev invited Nicolas Maduro to pay a state visit to Kazakhstan to discuss prospects for strengthening mutual ties," the press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Maduro seemed receptive, said he was pleased to discuss further cooperation. He also called the 80th anniversary of the Victory an event of global significance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maduro seemed receptive, said he was pleased to discuss further cooperation. He also called the eightieth anniversary of the Victory an event of global significance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In turn, the President of Venezuela said he was pleased to have the opportunity to discuss ways of further cooperation. He also described the celebration of the 80th anniversary of the Victory as an event of global significance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is interesting because he emphasized the role of all the Soviet peoples, you know, from the former USSR.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is interesting because he emphasized the role of all the Soviet peoples, you know, from the former U S S R.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, the people who were part of the Soviet Union played a key role in achieving Victory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They also talked trade and economics, with a special focus on the energy sector, which makes sense for both countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They also talked trade and economics, with a special focus on the energy sector, which makes sense for both countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the discussion of prospects for expanding trade and economic cooperation, special attention was paid to the energy sector.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And they agreed to exchange lists of priority export products to find specific areas for growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And they agreed to exchange lists of priority export products to find specific areas for growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following the meeting, the parties agreed to prepare and exchange lists of priority export products in order to identify specific areas for growth between the two countries," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it sounds like they're trying to move from general goodwill to actual, concrete deals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it sounds like they're trying to move from general goodwill to actual, concrete deals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. This meeting was part of Tokayev's larger trip, he was invited by Putin for the anniversary events.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. This meeting was part of Tokayev's larger trip, he was invited by Putin for the anniversary events.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on May 8, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev arrived in Russia at the invitation of Russian President Vladimir Putin to take part in events dedicated to the 80th anniversary of the Great Victory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he's using the time in Moscow to hold several of these meetings with other heads of state. Efficient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's using the time in Moscow to hold several of these meetings with other heads of state. Efficient.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Kazakh President was scheduled to hold a number of meetings with heads of foreign states while in Moscow.
